thread.title: BRIEF-Soochow Securities' New Borrowings Exceeded 20 Pct Of Company's Net Assets End-2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Soochow Securities' New Borrowings Exceeded 20 Pct Of Company's Net Assets End-2017

organizations.name: brief-soochow securities' new borrowings exceeded 20 pct of company

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Soochow Securities Co Ltd:
* SAYS NEW BORROWINGS TOTALLING 4.5 BILLION YUAN ($718.95 million) AS OF JAN 31, EXCEEDS 20 PERCENT OF NET ASSETS END-2017
* SAYS THE NEW BORROWINGS DO NOT HAVE NEGATIVE IMPACT TO COMPANY'S OPERATION Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2nHA4M7 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2591 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
